Text saved: The Hunger Games is an event that happens every year, which the Capitol uses to remind the districts that they are being punished for fighting against the government. Every year, one boy and one girl aged 12 to 18 are chosen from each district by lottery to compete in a battle where only one person can survive. The chosen teenagers are called "tributes", which are the people selected to fight in the games, and the whole country is forced to watch the event on TV.
